description: Deletes a SAS definition from a specified storage account. This operation requires the storage/deletesas permission.

storage_account_name.description: The name of the storage account.

tags.description: Application specific metadata in the form of key-value pairs

sas_definition_name.description: The name of the SAS definition.

sid.description: Storage account SAS definition secret id.

templateuri.description: The SAS definition token template signed with an arbitrary key.  Tokens created according to the SAS definition will have the same properties as the template.

sastype.description: The type of SAS token the SAS definition will create.

validityperiod.description: The validity period of SAS tokens created according to the SAS definition.
